item.title: CVS 等 14 家公司在 CPI 报告前抢滩高端市场
item.description: 周一，CVS Health Corp. 和雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.【原文：CVS Health Corp. and a unit of Chevron Corp. are among 14 firms offering US investment-grade bonds Monday, the most in three months, a day before heavily anticipated consumer-price data is due for release.】

item.title: 银行赢得金融科技公司 IntraFi 20 亿美元债务交易
item.description: 金融技术公司 IntraFi 在杠杆贷款市场上筹集了 20 多亿美元，标志着华尔街银行在与私人信贷公司的竞争中取得了胜利。【原文：Financial technology firm IntraFi raised more than $2 billion in the leveraged loan market, marking a win for Wall Street banks against private credit firms, which had discussed providing a debt package in recent months.】

item.title: 创始人手握商业计划书，开始寻找可销售的产品
item.description:
对于雷明顿-霍奇基斯（Remington Hotchkis）来说，想出一个从火灾中拯救家园的点子并不难。而确定一种他可以制造的实际产品则比较困难。【原文：

For Remington Hotchkis, devising an idea for saving homes from fires was the easy part. Identifying an actual product he could make was harder.

】

item.title: 波多黎各董事会解聘与 Prepa 破产纠纷纠缠不清
item.description: 波多黎各财政监督委员会的动荡正在延缓其电力公司的破产进程，因为监督此案的法官暂停了近期的申请截止日期，并要求提供委员会成员的最新情况。【原文：The upheaval of Puerto Rico’s financial oversight board is slowing down the bankruptcy of its power utility as the judge overseeing the case suspended a near-term filing deadline and asked for a status update on the board’s membership.】

item.title: 可可期货因担心西非作物减产而大涨
item.description: 可可期货攀升至12月以来的最高点，原因是人们对西非下一季作物产量预测疲软的担忧再度升温。【原文：Cocoa futures climbed the most since December amid renewed concern about weaker West African crop forecasts in the coming season.】

item.title: 投资者等待 CPI 数据确定美联储路线，美股走势低迷
item.description: 周一开盘后不久，美国股市变化不大，因为投资者在为本周的众多数据做准备，这些数据可能决定美联储恢复降息的速度。【原文：US stocks were little changed Monday soon after the open as investors geared up for a week filled with data that could determine how quickly the Federal Reserve resumes its interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: Prosus 48 亿美元的 Just Eat 交易获得欧盟有条件批准
item.description: Prosus NV 计划以 41 亿欧元（约合 48 亿美元）收购 Just Eat Takeaway.com，该计划已获得欧盟有条件批准，此前这家荷兰食品配送公司同意减持另一家竞争对手的股份，以消除对竞争的担忧。【原文：Prosus NV’s planned €4.1 billion ($4.8 billion) takeover of Just Eat Takeaway.com has won conditional approval from the European Union, after the Dutch food delivery firm agreed to reduce its stake in another rival to allay competition concerns.】

item.title: C3.ai 因 "不可接受 "的业绩和首席执行官的健康问题下跌 30
item.description: C3.ai Inc. 在盘前交易中暴跌 30%，原因是该软件公司因创始人的健康问题导致销售额大幅下滑。【原文：C3.ai Inc. tumbled 30% in premarket trading after a steep sales miss the software company attributed to its founder’s health issues.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油公司伏尔加河地区炼油厂遭袭后停止进油
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）旗下的萨拉托夫炼油厂在周日遭到无人机袭击后已停止进油。【原文：Russia’s Saratov refinery, owned by Rosneft PJSC, has stopped oil intake following a drone attack on Sunday, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州机构警告：有毒页岩钻井废水威胁顶级油田
item.description: 德克萨斯州一个负责监管 1,300 万英亩州属土地的机构警告说，页岩钻探产生的有毒废液有可能污染北美最多产原油盆地的油井。【原文：A Texas agency overseeing 13 million acres of state land is warning that toxic waste fluid from shale drilling threatens to contaminate oil wells in North America’s most prolific crude basin.】

item.title: 富国银行顶级股票策略师 Chris Harvey 离职
item.description: 富国银行证券有限责任公司（Wells Fargo Securities LLC）股票策略主管克里斯托弗-哈维（Christopher Harvey）已离开公司。【原文：Christopher Harvey, head of equity strategy for Wells Fargo Securities LLC, has left the firm.】

item.title: 加拿大赴美旅游人数连续第七个月下滑
item.description: 由于加拿大人加大了抵制美国的力度，前往美国的公路旅行连续第七个月减少。【原文：Road trips to the US decreased for a seventh straight month as Canadians ramped up their American boycott.】

item.title: 尽管市场形势严峻，黄金仍推动安大略教师队伍实现 2.1% 的涨幅
item.description: 安大略教师养老金计划在今年上半年因黄金而获得了 2.1%的收益，这足以抵消私人资产的微弱回报。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan gained 2.1% in the first half of the year thanks to gold, which more than offset the muted returns of private assets.】

item.title: 国泰君安内部销售价值 3170 亿美元的 SPDR 产品阵容
item.description: 道富公司（State Street Corp. ）准备控制其一些历史最悠久、最知名的交易所交易基金的销售和市场营销，这些基金的销售和市场营销工作外包了二十多年。【原文：State Street Corp. is poised to gain control over the sales and marketing of some of its oldest and best-known exchange-traded funds, efforts that were outsourced for more than two decades.】

item.title: 即使产量恢复，矿山坍塌仍对科德尔科公司债务造成影响
item.description: 上周末，Codelco 的 El Teniente 铜矿部分恢复了生产，但导致该矿关闭一周的致命事故很可能会对这家智利公司的债券造成更长时间的影响。【原文：Codelco’s El Teniente copper mine partially resumed production over the weekend, but the fatal accident that closed it for a week is likely to weigh on the Chilean company’s bonds for far longer.】

item.title: 价格上涨，美光上调销售和盈利展望
item.description: 美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc. raised its fiscal fourth-quarter revenue and earnings outlook, citing “improved pricing” for a key product.】

item.title: 派拉蒙斥资 77 亿美元购买终极格斗锦标赛版权，以提高流媒体播放量
item.description: 派拉蒙公司（Paramount）与终极格斗锦标赛（Ultimate Fighting Championship）周一宣布，派拉蒙获得了终极格斗锦标赛未来七年在美国所有赛事的独家播放权，这笔价值 77 亿美元的交易旨在促进派拉蒙+流媒体服务的发展。【原文：Paramount has acquired the exclusive rights to show all events from the Ultimate Fighting Championship in the US over the next seven years, the companies announced Monday, a $7.7 billion deal designed to boost the Paramount+ streaming service.】

item.title: Revel 将终止纽约共享汽车业务，专注于电动汽车充电业务
item.description: Revel Transit 公司在纽约市经受住了激烈的竞争后，计划结束共享出行业务，转向电动汽车充电业务，将优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Revel Transit Inc. plans to wind down rideshare operations after weathering stiff competition in its home city of New York, pivoting to an EV-charging business that counts Uber Technologies Inc. as a partner rather than rival.】

item.title: 船舶信号欺骗扩散到俄罗斯太平洋科兹米诺港
item.description: 最近几天，由于船只的自动定位信号开始受到电子干扰，俄罗斯太平洋沿岸科兹米诺（Kozmino）石油码头的原油出口变得更加难以追踪。【原文：Exports of crude from the Kozmino oil terminal on Russia’s Pacific coast have become harder to track in recent days, after ships’ automated position signals began to suffer electronic interference.】

item.title: 亚洲绿色氢能项目为陷入困境的技术提供生命线
item.description:
中国和印度的大规模计划为无碳燃料实现成本效益提供了途径。【原文：

Massive plans in China and India provide pathways for the carbon-free fuel to become cost-effective.

】

item.title: CoinDesk 所有者 Bullish 提升 IPO 规模，寻求 9.9 亿美元融资
item.description: Bullish 提高了首次公开募股的规模和价格，将潜在交易规模从约 6.29 亿美元提高到 9.9 亿美元，因为加密货币相关公司希望抓住投资者兴趣高涨的机会。【原文：Bullish increased the size and price of its initial public offering, boosting the potential deal size to $990 million from about $629 million as crypto-related companies look to ride high investor interest.】

item.title: 印度股票基金在七月大跌中获得创纪录的 50 亿美元资金流入
item.description: 尽管美国与关税相关的担忧引发了今年最严重的市场抛售，但印度的普通投资者仍在 7 月份增加了股票投资。【原文：India’s mom-and-pop investors topped up their equity investments in July, even as US tariffs-related concerns triggered one of the worst market selloffs this year.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 VTB 银行在战争压力下贷款收入下降
item.description: 俄罗斯第二大银行 VTB 银行（VTB Bank PJSC）的贷款利润正在持续恶化，在弗拉基米尔-普京总统对乌克兰发动的战争所带来的经济压力下，该银行的稳定性令人担忧。【原文：Russia’s second largest bank, VTB Bank PJSC, is seeing a sustained deterioration in profits made from lending, feeding concern at the bank over its stability amid the economic pressures from President Vladimir Putin’s war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 诺和诺德、奥尔斯特德的困境使丹麦股票基准成为世界上最差的股票基准
item.description: Orsted A/S是过去一年中已经遭遇过不少麻烦的市场受到的最新打击。【原文：Orsted A/S is the latest blow to a market that has already had more than its share of troubles in the past year.】

item.title: 英特尔公司谭旭光被迫充当说客以赢得特朗普支持
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）将探讨英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）批评并敦促其辞职后所面临的挑战。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 特朗普仓促达成不完整贸易协定的弊端
item.description: 随着关税的实施，一系列暂定协议的达成，以及美国股市不断刷新纪录，难怪唐纳德-特朗普总统对其重塑全球经济的努力充满信心。【原文：With his tariffs in place, a collection of tentative deals to hail and US equities testing new records, it’s little wonder that President Donald Trump is feeling buoyant about his efforts to remake the global economy.】

item.title: Blue Apron 取消订阅模式，转而采用自选餐包
item.description: Blue Apron 正在改变其首创的每周订购模式，转而销售无需或只需很少准备的点餐套餐，以迎合消费者对更经济、更方便的食品选择的偏好。【原文：Blue Apron is moving away from the weekly subscription model it pioneered to sell a-la-carte meal kits that require zero or little preparation, as it caters to shifting consumer preferences for more budget-friendly and convenient food options.】

item.title: AT1 债券的 "竞相抄底 "促使退伍军人改变策略
item.description: 随着一级附加债券市场越来越多地涌入新的买家，资深投资者正在调整他们的投资策略，以避开拥挤的人群及其带来的风险。【原文：As the Additional Tier 1 bond market gets ever-more swamped with new buyers, veteran investors are adjusting their playbooks to avoid the crowds — and the risks they bring.】

item.title: 巴里克公司因马里矿山净亏损 10 亿美元，业绩下滑
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）在盘前交易中暴跌，因为这家加拿大矿商公布了一项 10.4 亿美元的净支出，与马里军政府没收其庞大的卢洛-古恩科托（Loulo-Gounkoto）金矿综合体有关。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. slumped in pre-market trading after the Canadian miner posted a net charge of $1.04 billion related to the seizure of its vast Loulo-Gounkoto gold complex by Mali’s military junta.】
